com.redhat.rhn.domain.errata
Class ErrataFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
      com.redhat.rhn.domain.errata.ErrataFactory

public class ErrataFactory
extends HibernateFactory

ErrataFactory - the singleton class used to fetch and store com.redhat.rhn.domain.errata.Errata objects from the database.

publish

public static Errata publish(Errata unpublished)
publish takes an unpublished errata and copies its contents into a Published Errata object (and then returns this object). This method also handles removing the old Unpublished Errata object and child elements from the db.

Parameters:
unpublished - The Errata to publish
Returns:
Returns a published errata.

publishToChannel

public static java.util.List<Errata> publishToChannel(java.util.List<Errata> errataList,
                                                      Channel chan,
                                                      User user,
                                                      boolean inheritPackages)
Takes a published or unpublished errata and publishes to a channel, creating all of the correct ErrataFile* entries. This method does push packages to the appropriate channel. (Appropriate as defined as the channel previously having a package with the same name).

Parameters:
errataList - list of errata to publish
chan - channel to publish it into.
user - the user doing the pushing
inheritPackages - include only original channel packages
Returns:
the publsihed errata

publishToChannel

public static Errata publishToChannel(Errata errata,
                                      Channel chan,
                                      User user,
                                      java.util.Set<Package> packages)
Publish an errata to a channel but only push a small set of packages along with it

Parameters:
errata - errata to publish
chan - channel to publish it into.
user - the user doing the pushing
packages - the packages to push
Returns:
the published errata

lookupByAdvisory

public static Errata lookupByAdvisory(java.lang.String advisory)
Look up an errata by the advisory name. This is a unique field in the db and this method is needed to help us see if a created/edited advisoryName is unique.

Parameters:
advisory - The advisory to lookup
Returns:
Returns the errata corresponding to the passed in advisory name.

                                                                 Channel channel,

                                                                 java.lang.String endDate)

endDate - the end date

A list of Errata objects
